laboratory_examinations.findings: Nuchal translucency (NT) = 1.3 mm; enlarged bladder with a diameter of 12 mm.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: After 1 week, the bladder diameter was slightly reduced to 10 mm.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Multiple structural abnormalities including right multicystic kidney, left hydronephrosis, and cleft lip and palate.
De novo missense mutation (c.1027C > T R304W) detected in exon 8 of the TP63 gene; no mutation at this site found in the parents.
